text: Gei mee gaa dangi ang gi Dimaadua be dehee dana hai gaa hai, gei Dimaadua digi hila ang gi mee, be mai i ana midi, be mai i nia hadu haga madagu ‘Urim’ mo ‘Thummim’,28.6 ‘Urim’ mo ‘Thummim’: Aanei la nia mee ala ne hai hegau ai tangada hai mee dabu belee iloo ai di manawa o God. Gidaadou e de iloo hagahumalia be ne hai hegau behee.  be mai baahi nia soukohp.28.6 Numbers 27.21
